game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: Embark on an adventure to find the long-lost treasure of the ancient kingdom. Solve clues, defeat enemies, and navigate through treacherous landscapes to uncover the ultimate reward.
game.reward: A chest filled with gold, jewels, and ancient artifacts

tasks.objective: Solve the riddle of the forgotten temple
tasks.description: Travel to the ancient temple located deep in the jungle. Crack the code to enter the temple and reveal the first clue to the treasure's whereabouts.

tasks.objective: Defeat the guardians of the labyrinth
tasks.description: Navigate through a labyrinth guarded by mythical creatures and traps. Survive the challenges and retrieve the second clue hidden within.
Cross a dangerous river infested with deadly creatures. Find the hidden path and safely reach the other side to uncover the third clue.
Climb the treacherous mountain and face extreme weather conditions. Reach the summit to unveil the final clue leading to the exact location of the treasure.
